Package message

Class Summary
ClientMessage This extends MessageProtocol, providing data useful for a Client to receive.
InputParser A collection of static methods that can be used to parse a user's input
MessageProtocol This is the default communication protocol between the Client and Server.
ServerMessage This extends MessageProtocol, providing data useful for a Server to receive.
 

Enum Summary
Command An enum representing acceptable commands that clients can send.
Status The status of a given message is reflected with this enum.
